frontend.name: MediCo
frontend.description: Medical consultation web application for remote access to healthcare services with accessibility features for elderly.
bulletpoints: Developed a web application with React framework and Javascript and Firebase as backend
Managed a team of 6 developers to ensure timely completion and delivery of project
Designed and implemented application architecture for easy reusability and integration with Firebase's Authentication service
Implemented live chat feature with Firebase's Firestore database

frontend.name: SGSAFETY - Web Application
frontend.description: Promotional website for SGSafety Android mobile application, a distress signal broadcaster and receiver.
bulletpoints: Developed a web application with React framework and Javascript to promote SGSAFETY Android mobile application
Led a team of 6 members through the software development process from planning to deployment
Managed project timeline with Agile framework, delegated tasks to team members for timely completion
Integrated cross-platform authentication via Firebase's Authentication service for both web and mobile
Integrated live AED location map into website via Singapore governmentâ€™s AED Locations API

frontend.name: Chat Application Web
frontend.description: Online web application for chatting with Min... if you know the secret!
bulletpoints: Developed a web application with React framework and Javascript
Built responsive UI with Material UI
Integrated Firebase Authentication for secret check
Implemented Firestore database for live chat functinality

frontend.name: kk-min.github.io
bulletpoints: Developed a web application with React framework, Typescript and CSS
Designed and implemented tab-based content navigation
Designed reusable components from ground up for easy integration into other projects

backend.name: SGSAFETY - Android Application
backend.description: Android mobile application for broadcasting and receiving distress signals.
bulletpoints: Developed a native Android application in Kotlin with Firebase as remote database
Managed a team of 5 developers to ensure timely completion and delivery of project
Spearheaded application architecture design decisions
Implemented distress signal broadcasting via a distributed computation approach using Firebase Topic Messaging
Implemented live location trail and map view using OpenStreetMaps API

backend.name: Android Bluetooth Controller Application
backend.description: Android mobile application for controlling and communicating with a Raspberry PI via Bluetooth signals.
bulletpoints: Developed a native Android application in Java to provide Bluetooth communication with a Raspberry PI
Implemented Bluetooth scanning and connection with other devices
Planned and collaborated signal headers and payloads with Raspberry PI developer for varying communication functionalities
Assisted GUI Developer in live display of communication status and received data to GUI
Designed and implemented a 5-attempt Bluetooth reconnection mechanism for consistent and robust connection

backend.name: Chat Application Desktop
backend.description: Desktop Application for chat communication between two clients.
bulletpoints: Developed a desktop application in Java and JavaFX
Implemented GUI using JavaFX and Model-View-Controller (MVC) framework
Integrated asnyhronous execution of I/O bound operations for concurrent send/receive operations using Java's CompletableFuture library

backend.name: Stock Exchange System
backend.description: Model of a stock exchange system with price-time order matching.
bulletpoints: Developed a console application in Java
Implemented price-time order matching system
Implemented quote history tracking for different stocks
Adhered to best-practice design principles such as Single Responsibility Principle and Dependency Inversion Principle

miscellaneous.name: Bluetooth Server Tester
miscellaneous.description: Python server-side application for testing client-side Bluetooth functionalities.
bulletpoints: Developed a Python application with and PyBluez library for sending/receiving Bluetooth messages
Implemented multi-threading for concurrent send/receive operations
Designed and implemented bluetooth reconnection mechanism via polling and automatic connection reinitiation

miscellaneous.name: Accounting Process and Calculation Automation
miscellaneous.description: Various Python/VBA scripts for automating accounting calculations and processes.
bulletpoints: Developed various Python and VBA scripts for automating accounting processes and calculations
Designed user interface for easy usability and user onboarding
Implemented Python program to interface with Outlook API for automated file downloading and decryption
Implemented VBA scripts for excel manipulations including custom cross-file data extraction, data validation
